verses.verse: In <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, do I put my <S%H2620>trust<s%>: let me <S%H408>never<s%> be put to <S%H954>confusion<s%>.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and cause me to <S%H6403>escape<s%>: <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H3467>me<s%>, and save me.

Be you my <S%H6697>strong<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>, unto what I may <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H935>resort<s%>: you have given <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5553>me<s%>; for you are my rock and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>.
<S%H6403>Deliver<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H5765>unrighteous<s%> and cruel <S%H2556>man<s%>.
For you are my <S%H8615>hope<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: you are my <S%H4009>trust<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

By you have I been held <S%H5564>up<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>: you are he that <S%H1491>took<s%> me out of my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H4578>bowels<s%>: my <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be continually of <S%H8548>you<s%>.
I am as a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> unto <S%H7227>many<s%>; but you are my <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.
Let my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with your <S%H8416>praise<s%> and with your <S%H8597>honor<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Cast me not <S%H7993>off<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of old <S%H2209>age<s%>; <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not when my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3615>fails<s%>.
For my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> against <S%H8104>me<s%>; and they that lay wait for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>,
<S%H559>Saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7291>him<s%>: persecute and <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H5337>him<s%>; for there is none to deliver him.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H430>me<s%>: O my God, make <S%H2363>haste<s%> for my <S%H5833>help<s%>.

Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> that are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; let them be <S%H5844>covered<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
But I will <S%H3176>hope<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, and will yet <S%H8416>praise<s%> you <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more<s%>.

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall show <S%H5608>forth<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>; for I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the numbers <S%H5615>there<s%>.
I will go <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, even of your only.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, you have <S%H3925>taught<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>: and until now have I <S%H5046>declared<s%> your wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.

Now also <S%H5704>when<s%> I am <S%H2209>old<s%> and <S%H7872>grayheaded<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me <S%H5046>not<s%>; until I have showed your <S%H2220>strength<s%> unto this <S%H1755>generation<s%>, and your <S%H1369>power<s%> to every one that is to <S%H935>come<s%>.
Your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H430>also<s%>, O God, is very <S%H4791>high<s%>, who have <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%>: O <S%H430>God<s%>, who is like unto you

<S%H7200>You<s%>, which have showed me <S%H7227>great<s%> and <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%>, shall <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me <S%H7725>again<s%>, and shall bring me <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H8415>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
You shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> my <S%H1420>greatness<s%>, and <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me on every <S%H5437>side<s%>.

I will also <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with the <S%H3627>psaltery<s%>, even your <S%H571>truth<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: unto you will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp<s%>, O you Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall greatly <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> when I <S%H2167>sing<s%> unto <S%H5315>you<s%>; and my soul, which you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%>.

My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> also shall <S%H1897>talk<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H954>long<s%>: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto <S%H2659>shame<s%>, that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
